SELECT com.*, f.id parent_id, f.name parent_name, f.icon parent_icon, f.type parent_type FROM resource com LEFT JOIN resource f ON com.parent_id = f.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND com.type =#{type , jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND com.name like '%'|| #{name , jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
ORDER by com.create_time DESC
SELECT url, permission FROM resource WHERE url IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sort ASC

SELECT re.id, re.name, re.parent_id, re.url, re.type, re.icon, ( CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_role_resources rr WHERE rr.resources_id = re.id AND rr.role_id = #{rid} ) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) AS checked FROM resource re ORDER BY re.sort ASC

SELECT r.id, r.name, node.id AS node_id, node.name AS node_name, node.parent_id FROM resource r LEFT JOIN resource node ON ( node.parent_id = r.id AND node.available = true AND node.type = 'menu' ) WHERE r.type = 'menu' AND (r.url IS NULL OR r.url = '') AND (r.permission IS NULL OR r.permission = '') ORDER BY r.sort ASC, node.sort ASC

SELECT re.id, re.name, re.parent_id, re.url, re.permission, re.icon, re.sort FROM resource re INNER JOIN sys_role_resources rr ON re.id = rr.resources_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rr.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY re.parent_id ASC, re.sort ASC
